name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 62: The Ski
overview: Simple 1500 Series vol. 62 - The Ski is a Ski game that use the same graphic engine that the Snowboarding. The game features 3 main characters (that the player can change their clothes) and 3 game modes: - Race Mode: Compete against yourself or 1 or 2 computer opponents and try to win the race. - Trick Mode: Compete against yourself or 1 or 2 computer opponents and do the best trick score. - Mix Mode: A mix between race & trick mode. You got to win the race and do as much tricks as you can.
